abstract_ssm: Broadcast version: At 2000 Induction Ceremony -- Patti Smith inducts Clive Davis -- Video montage of Clive Davis -- Clive Davis accepts his award -- People Have the Power (Patti Smith Group) -- Paul Simon inducts The Moonglows -- Members of the Moonglows accept their awards -- Ten Commandments of Love; Sincerely (The Moonglows) -- Video montage of the "sidemen" who were inducted: King Curtis, Hal Blaine, Scotty Moore, James Jamerson, and Earl Palmer -- Paul Simon inducts James Taylor -- James Taylor accepts his award -- Fire and Rain (James Taylor) -- Love and Happiness (Earth, Wind & Fire, Melissa Etheridge, Bonnie Raitt, Eric Clapton, James Taylor, Lovin' Spoonful) -- How Sweet It Is; Route 66 (Robbie Robertson, Melissa Etheridge, Bonnie Raitt, Eric Clapton, James Taylor, Lovin' Spoonful) -- Credits
